concept.title: Referencing Environment Variables
concept.shortdesc: You can reference an environment variable in the properties file by surrounding the environment variable with dollar signs, as follows: $<environment variable>$.

conbody.p: environment variablesreferences in the Data Collector configuration fileData Collector configuration filereferencing environment variablesFor example, to define the runtime.conf.location property as a subdirectory of the working directory, you could configure the property as follows:runtime.conf.location=$PWD$/runtime
